column1: The image should have a max height of roughly 400px.
column2: The image should have a max height of roughly 400px.

column1: Render the callout image on the left or right. Defaults to left.
column2: Render the callout image on the left or right. Defaults to left.

column1: Render the callout image in the center or as the background. Defaults to center.
column2: Render the callout image in the center or as the background. Defaults to center.

column1: Label used for special badge. Default is 'Special'.
column2: Label used for special badge. Default is 'Special'.

column1: Invert the text color if your background image is dark and you want light text. Default is No.
column2: Invert the text color if your background image is dark and you want light text. Default is No.

column1: The fully-qualified URL you want the customer to be directed to.
column2: The fully-qualified URL you want the customer to be directed to.
